timeline.bodyText: It seems to me the KEY_CONNECTION_ID constant itself and the other remaining places where it is used can be removed as well. As far as I see it, the id was used in connection with the long removed Hono messaging component (?).
timeline.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: As I understood, KEY_CONNECTION_ID is being used by copyProperties(...) and getConnectionId(final ProtonConnection connection). And copyProperties(...) is in use in AmqpServiceBase and SimpleAuthenticationServer.
replies.author: kaniyan

replies.bodyText: Yes, but the ID is only ever set in the attachments. Except for the copyProperties method, the ID is not read (see usage of getConnectionId). See also the long removed HonoMessaging class.
replies.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: Good point. I have now removed the obsolete code regarding connection-id which is being set in AMQP connection attachments.
replies.author: kaniyan

timeline.message:
Remove obsolete constants and methods

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Remove obsolete code regarding connection-id set in AMQP connection attachments

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

Remove obsolete code regarding connection-id set in AMQP connection attachments

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
